verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3569>Cushi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2396>Hizkiah,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
I will utterly <S%H5486>consume<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things from <S%H5921>off<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I will <S%H5486>consume<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> I will <S%H5486>consume<s%> the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the stumbling <S%H4384>blocks<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> and I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H5921>off<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I will also <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3649>Chemarims<s%> with the <S%H3548>priests;<s%>

And them that <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> on the <S%H1406>housetops;<s%> and them that <S%H7812>worship<s%> and that <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and that <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H4445>Malcham;<s%>
And them that are <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H5253>back<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and those that have not <S%H1245>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1875>inquired<s%> for him.

Hold your <S%H2013>peace<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> he has <S%H6942>bid<s%> his <S%H7121>guests.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> such as are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H4403>apparel.<s%>

In the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> also will I <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those that <S%H1801>leap<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4670>threshold,<s%> which <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H113>masters'<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that there shall be the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H6818>cry<s%> from the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and an <S%H3213>howling<s%> from the <S%H4932>second,<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>crashing<s%> from the <S%H1389>hills.<s%>

<S%H3213>Howl,<s%> you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4389>Maktesh,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3667>merchant<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1820>cut<s%> down; <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H5187>bear<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> are <S%H3772>cut<s%> off.

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> that I will <S%H2664>search<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H5216>candles,<s%> and <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that are <S%H7087>settled<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H8105>lees:<s%> that <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will not do <S%H3190>good,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will he do <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Therefore their <S%H2428>goods<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H4933>booty,<s%> and their <S%H1004>houses<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation:<s%> they shall also <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> but not <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> them; and they shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> but not <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> thereof.

The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> it is <S%H7138>near,<s%> and <S%H4116>hastens<s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> even the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man shall <S%H6873>cry<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H4751>bitterly.<s%>

That <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H4691>distress,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7722>devastation<s%> and <S%H4875>desolation,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and <S%H653>gloominess,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6051>clouds<s%> and thick <S%H6205>darkness,<s%>

A <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> and <S%H8643>alarm<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H6438>towers.<s%>

And I will bring <S%H6887>distress<s%> on <S%H120>men,<s%> that they shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> like <S%H5787>blind<s%> men, <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be <S%H8210>poured<s%> out as <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and their <S%H3894>flesh<s%> as the <S%H1561>dung.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> their <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> their <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H5678>wrath;<s%> but the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> by the <S%H784>fire<s%> of his <S%H7068>jealousy:<s%> for he shall <S%H6213>make<s%> even a <S%H926>speedy<s%> <S%H3617>riddance<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
